name: Clippy's Legacy
description:
You simply want to copy some pictures from your dads' old computer. Little do you know this old version of Microsoft Windows has a personal assistant waiting for you!

  • 2 endings!
  • Extremely short!
  • I hope you can handle Clippy's passive aggressiveness!

If experiencing "No valid storage adapters found", please enable cookies for itch.io in general or specifically for this page. Clippy requires "cookies", not to track your personal life, but to store saves. Clippy promises not to look in your personal files.
